principle.name: Design System First Approach
principle.description: Always extract and apply comprehensive design systems from foundation-blueprint.html before component transformation
principle.rationale: Consistent design systems ensure professional, cohesive visual results

example.good: Extract colors, typography, layout patterns from foundation-blueprint.html before applying to components
Maintain design system consistency across all transformed components
Document design decisions and pattern usage from the blueprint
example.bad: Apply random styling without systematic design extraction
Ignore established design patterns from the HTML blueprint

principle.name: Functionality Preservation
principle.description: Maintain all original component functionality, props, and state logic
principle.rationale: Visual improvements should never break existing functionality

example.good: Test all props work correctly after transformation
Verify state management and event handlers remain intact
Maintain component interfaces and API compatibility
example.bad: Remove or modify props without user approval
Break existing component behavior during redesign

principle.name: JavaScript/JSX Output Standard
principle.description: All transformed components must be valid JavaScript files with JSX syntax
principle.rationale: Ensures compatibility with Next.js and modern React projects

example.good: Output .js files with proper JSX syntax and imports
Use ES6+ features like arrow functions and destructuring
example.bad: Output TypeScript files or other formats
Use JSX without proper JavaScript file extension

principle.rule: Extract comprehensive color hierarchies from HTML files

implementation.step: Map Tailwind color extensions and theme configurations
Document color usage patterns (backgrounds, text, borders, accents)
Apply consistent color applications throughout components

examples.pattern: Hover state transitions: color transitions with proper contrast

guidelines.rule: Use primary accent colors for emphasis and branding
Maintain dark text for optimal readability
Apply white text only on colored backgrounds
Ensure proper contrast ratios for accessibility
